articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: iOS 26 beta 4 arrives, with Liquid Glass tweaks and AI news summaries - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple launches iOS 26 beta 4 for developers with updates to Liquid Glass and AI notification summaries. A public beta is expected later this week.
articles.content: Apple on Tuesday released the fourth developer beta of its next big software update, iOS 26, which brings with it slight changes to its Liquid Glass redesign and the re-introduction of AI-powered not… [+2941 chars]
